function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
	local T_Group1_Spawner = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("CAMP_Hawe_CrusadersMont_GhostGroup1_Spawners")
	
	for i, idSpawner in pairs(T_Group1_Spawner) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorEnable(idSpawner)
		end
	end
end

arQuestPhases.unk_9c63f9d:
Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ClaimSwitch, false)
Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_BRAZIER_04)
Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_BRAZIER_01)
Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_BRAZIER_01, true)

local tAllPlayers = Hydra.QuestGetParticipants()
     
for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tAllPlayers) do
	-- Drop the TreasureClass, which contains both "always" and "first time" rewards
	-- The First Time stuff is conditioned by the flag that is set after the drop occurs
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(bossLootDropper) then
		Hydra.TreasureClassDropAtActorForPlayer(bossLootDropper, "FirstTimeReward_Stronghold_CrusadersMonument", idPlayer)
	end

	-- Set the variable, to mark that this player has recieved a reward
	Hydra.SetPlayerVariableFlag(idPlayer, "FirstTimeReward_Stronghold_CrusadersMonument")
end

	tBoss = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("CAMP_CrusadersMont_Boss")
	for i, idBoss in pairs(tBoss) do
		Hydra.ActorSetInvisible(idBoss, true)
		Hydra.ActorSetCollidable(idBoss, false)
	end
end

function Start(flGameTime)
--rework this to be ambushes that spawn when the associated skull has been retrieved
--	if bCarry == true then
--		for i, playerID in pairs(Hydra.PlayerActors()) do
--			Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(T_TrickleSpawn[1], Hydra.ActorGetPosition(playerID))
--			ShuffleTable(T_TrickleSpawn)
--		end
--	end


T_BOSSES = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("CMP_CrusadersMont_BossSpawner")
	for i, idActor in pairs (T_BOSSES) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idActor) and bBarrier == true then
			for i, idBRAZIER in pairs (BRAZIER_GIZMOS) do
				Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idBRAZIER, true)
				Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(FX_GHOST_TARGET, FX_BARRIER, true)
				bBarrier = false
			end
		end
	end
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
if (Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(357) == 1) and (Hydra.ActorIsEnabled(ID_KNIGHT1_GHOST) == false) then
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(ID_KNIGHT1_GHOST, 10)
		Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_KNIGHT1_GHOST)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_KNIGHT1_GHOST, FX_GHOST_BURST)
elseif (Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(358) == 1) and (Hydra.ActorIsEnabled(ID_KNIGHT2_GHOST) == false) then
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(ID_KNIGHT2_GHOST, 10)
		Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_KNIGHT2_GHOST)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_KNIGHT2_GHOST, FX_GHOST_BURST)
elseif (Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(359) == 1) and (Hydra.ActorIsEnabled(ID_PRIEST_GHOST) == false) then	
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(ID_PRIEST_GHOST, 10)
		Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_PRIEST_GHOST)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_PRIEST_GHOST, FX_GHOST_BURST)
end
	
Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(BRAZIER_LOC, FX_FIRE_BURST)
	if (Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(343) == 2) then
		Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_BRAZIER_02)
		Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_BRAZIER_01)
	elseif (Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(343) == 3) then
		Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_BRAZIER_03)
		Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_BRAZIER_02)
	elseif (Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(343) == 4) then
		Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_BRAZIER_04)
		Hydra.ActorDisable(ID_BRAZIER_03)
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_BRAZIER_04, true)
		Hydra.MusicOverride("Sanctuary_Eastern_Continent", "Music_Hawezar_Monument_Stronghold_Boss")
		Hydra.Wait(4)
		
	end

end

	for i, idBRAZIER in pairs (BRAZIER_GIZMOS) do
	--either of these work, figure out which is better for visuals.
		Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idBRAZIER, false) 
--		Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idBRAZIER, true)
		Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(FX_GHOST_TARGET, FX_BARRIER)
	end
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idItem)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(ID_GHOST_MONK, 10)
	Hydra.ActorEnable(ID_GHOST_MONK)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(ID_GHOST_MONK, FX_GHOST_BURST)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(ID_GHOST_MONK, true)
	Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(ID_GHOST_MONK, false)
	Hydra.Wait(.5)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(CONV_MONK_INTRO, ID_GHOST_MONK)
	
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(CONV_MONK_INTRO)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(ID_GHOST_MONK, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(ID_GHOST_MONK, true)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(ID_GHOST_MONK)
end
